text:
Mr. William G. Harley
September 11, 1961
Page 2
I would suggest that we bring this up for consideration of the
entire research committee prior to the NAEB convention so that some
firm decision could be made there. Let me know if this is all right
with you. If so, I can send each one a copy of your proposal to see
what the reaction is.
By the way, please have your secretary delete the ‚Äù609 10th Avenue"
in the address you have for me. It is incorrect.
Sincerely,
Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
